name: Elytra Creator - Minecraft PC
description:
Elytra Designer for Minecraft is the newest in the Creator series of apps from Seejaykay! Now you can fly around in Minecraft!

This is the ONLY Minecraft Elytra creator on the AppStore!

But note: this only works for Minecraft PC Version 1.9 or greater, nothing else!

Create an awesome and unique Elytra design to show off with Elytra Designer for Minecraft! Millions of designs possible allows for near endless customization of this BRAND NEW Minecraft feature!

Create incredible Elytra designs with these cool features:
- 3D PERFECT preview of your wing designs
- TONS of colors to choose from
- Professional editing tools
- Copy/paste
- Add 'noise' for detailed designs
- Erase tool and color picker
- Amazing templates to choose from, new ones added all the time!
- Easy exporting for your Elytra!

Created an Elytra you want to share? Email us the image at seejaykayapps@gmail.com and it may make it into the app!

Email us with any comments or questions! We'd love to hear from you!
